item.description:
Yeah I'm COMPLETELY stealing this idea directly from Beth and Social Fun!

"After the holidays, let's get together to "regift" the worst, tacky, useless holiday gift that we have received...You know you have them! Time to get rid of them!

Here's how it works - each attendee will bring an unwanted, re-wrapped gift to the Yankee Swap.

Doesn't matter what you bring - the good, the bad and ugly are all welcome! Even if you don't have anything to re-gift, pick up something and bring it anyway!

We will draw numbers, and number 1 will have the first choice, number 2 can choose between their gift and number 1, etc...at the end number 1 goes again and can swap gifts with anyone else there.
item.name: Post holiday "regifting" Yankee swap - see details - Wakefield
